title: Diamond Kada: Radiant Rose Gold Floral Bangle
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: A modern take on the traditional Kada, this piece showcases a delicate floral centerpiece meticulously crafted with shimmering CZ stones. The sleek, dual-band design ensures a comfortable fit and exudes contemporary elegance.
colors: Rose Gold and Brilliant White (of the CZ stones).
occasions: Perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to everyday wear
or a special evening out. A stunning accessory for modern Indian women.
description: This exquisite bangle combines the beauty of a classic design with modern aesthetics. Crafted from high-quality materials and polished to perfection, it offers both durability and timeless appeal. A versatile statement piece that elevates any ensemble.
